FdoINetworkShortestPathCommand Class Reference

#include <INetworkShortestPath.h>

Inherits FdoINetworkCommand.

Inheritance diagram for FdoINetworkShortestPathCommand:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

FdoINetworkShortestPathCommand subclasses from FdoINetworkCommand and is the main interface that defines the FDO network shortest path analysis feature. An instance can be created through the FdoIConnection::CreateCommand method. Not all FDO providers will support this command. The FdoICommandCapability should be used to verify if a given provider support this command.

Note:
This Help topic is provided for informational use only. There is no interface or support provided. Autodesk reserves the right to change the software related to the content herein.

Public Member Functions

virtual FDO_API void SetEndNetworkFeature (GisString *className, FdoPropertyValueCollection *featId)=0
 This method is used to set the end point of the network analysis. This is only required if the analysis option requires an end point (i.e shortest path).
virtual FDO_API void SetStartNetworkFeature (GisString *className, FdoPropertyValueCollection *featId)=0
 This method is used to set the starting point of the network analysis. The starting network feature must be set before the command is executed.
